dublinCore.dc:title: 114 HR 782 IH: Cancel the Sequester Act of 2015
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Conyers (for himself, Mr. Lowenthal, Mr. Vargas, Ms. Schakowsky, Ms. Moore, Mr. McGovern, Ms. Michelle Lujan Grisham of New Mexico, Ms. Wilson of Florida, Mr. Ellison, Ms. DeLauro, Mr. Pocan, and Mr. Grijalva) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Budget

form.official-title: To eliminate the sequestration under section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Cancel the Sequester Act of 2015.
Section 251A of the Balanced Budget and Emergency Deficit Control Act of 1985 (2 U.S.C. 901a) is repealed.
